init_hook:
function __log_echo() {
  if [[ "${REPO_SCRIPT_DEBUG-1}" == "1" ]]; then
    echo "$1"
  fi
}
__log_echo "━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━"
__log_echo "  Initializing Devbox: Rust"
__log_echo "━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━"

__log_echo " ➜ RUSTUP_HOME: $RUSTUP_HOME"
__log_echo " ➜ LIBRARY_PATH: $LIBRARY_PATH"

__log_echo " ➜ Create home directory"
mkdir -p "$RUSTUP_HOME"

__log_echo " ➜ Install rust toolchain"

rustup toolchain install nightly 1> /dev/null
rustup default stable 1> /dev/null
rustup component add clippy 1> /dev/null
rustup component add rust-src 1> /dev/null

__log_echo " ➜ Run cargo fetch"
cargo fetch &>/dev/null

__log_echo " ➜ Details"
rustup show
